experience.title: Education Research Assistant
experience.organization: University of Washington College of Education
experience.responsibilities: Collaborated on a multi-phase research project investigating the impact of inquiry-based learning on student retention in secondary science education. Analyzed classroom data and peer-reviewed literature to develop evidence-based pedagogical strategies.

experience.title: Undergraduate Researcher
experience.responsibilities: Conducted independent research on the integration of digital literacy tools in high school humanities curricula. Synthesized findings into a comprehensive report presented at the Undergraduate Research Symposium, focusing on closing the achievement gap through technology.

experience.title: Curriculum Development Intern
experience.responsibilities: Applied research findings regarding socio-emotional learning (SEL) to assist in the redesign of 10th-grade health education modules. Reviewed curriculum efficacy and suggested data-driven modifications to improve student outcomes.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
